name: Red Temple
description:
Version 2.0.

This is an old game made for Handheld NDS.

I wanted to make it available here. The game is free because of licensing with music used [ and its old, made over 10 years  ago ]. I don't have the source code any more to make big changes.

Hope you enjoy it. Read the readme included for saving!

Please follow for any future games :)

This game evolved from an older project Krexblibos 

More information here Tutorial
